index-content.head_title: Document Text Search & Indexing | APIs & Free Web App
index-content.head_description: Perform efficient text search and data indexing on PDF, MS Office, OpenDocument, and other popular file formats using our APIs or the free online Document Search app.
index-content.title: Comprehensive Document Search & Indexing Solution
index-content.description_1: Perform text search and indexing on PDF, Microsoft Office, OpenOffice and many other document file formats.
index-content.description_2: Quickly locate information in large document collections with advanced full-text search capabilities.
index-content.description_3: Customize search features like synonyms, fuzzy search, and stemming to enhance accuracy and results.

features.title: Key Features of {{ProdShortName}}
features.description: {{ProdShortName}} provides powerful tools for indexing and searching text in popular document formats. Simplify and enhance document management with advanced search functionality.

feature_1.title: Advanced text search
feature_1.content: Perform fast and accurate text searches across indexed documents.

feature_2.title: Customizable search options
feature_2.content: Utilize features like fuzzy search, synonyms, and stemming for more precise results.

feature_3.title: Support for multiple formats
feature_3.content: Index and search content in Microsoft Office, PDF, OpenOffice, and other common formats.

feature_4.title: Efficient indexing
feature_4.content: Quickly build and maintain indexes for large document collections.

formats.title: Supports 70+ file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports almost all widely used file formats

code_samples.index_title: Searching text in popular document formats

sample_index.title: Text Search
sample_index.content: {{ProdShortName}} is a powerful tool for finding text in documents. You can search through multiple documents in various formats stored in a specific folder. The search results are saved in a separate folder, allowing you to access and reuse them without running the search again.

sample_index.comment_5: Handle and process the search results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about {{ProdShortName}}.

item_1.question: Does {{ProdShortName}} require external tools for searching documents?
item_1.answer: No, {{ProdShortName}} works as a standalone solution and does not need additional tools or software like Adobe Acrobat or Microsoft Office to perform searches.

item_2.question: Can I test {{ProdShortName}} before purchasing?
item_2.answer: Yes, you can! {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial. You can explore its features, though the trial version may include limitations such as watermarks or restricted functionality. To unlock all features, you can request a free 30-day temporary license. Learn more on the [temporary license]({{LicensingUrl}}) page.

item_3.question: What licensing options are available?
item_3.answer: We provide several licensing models for {{ProdShortName}}, tailored to different needs. Choose a license based on your team size, usage scenario, or whether you need the SDK/API for client distribution. For flexible usage, consider a metered license where you pay based on actual usage. Learn more about your options on the [pricing]({{PricingUrl}}) page.

app_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Web Apps
app_links.description: Explore {{ProdShortName}} with our free web application. Perform text searches and indexing on over 70 popular file formats directly in your browser—completely free.

item_1.content: Search within PDF, Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and other file types straight from your web browser.

item_2.content: Upload DOCX to perform advanced text searches without needing to install software.

item_3.content: Test PDFs indexing and retrieval capabilities on various formats for free.

index-content-net.head_title: .NET API for Document Automation, Assembly & Report Generation
index-content-net.head_description: C# .NET API for document automation, assembly, and report generation. Create PDF, Word, Excel, PPTX, HTML, and email documents from custom templates.
index-content-net.title: .NET Document Automation & Reporting API
index-content-net.description: Generate reports in .NET applications by defining templates and merging data.
index-content-net.code_title: Fill a Chart in DOCX Using C#
index-content-net.overview_description: .NET solution for automating document creation with advanced data integration.

overview_feature_1.title: Add Business Data to Document Templates with C#
overview_feature_1.description: Report generation made easy: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can effortlessly insert data from sources like JSON or XML into predefined templates.

overview_feature_2.title: Process Native Data Objects
overview_feature_2.description: Supported document types include embedded objects like diagrams, charts, tables, and lists that can be populated automatically with data.

overview_feature_3.title: Additional Features
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides extensive customization options. Programmatically design data objects, generate barcodes, use online data sources via URLs, and save output in various formats.

features.title: {{ProdShortName}} Features
features.description: Create documents and reports using advanced data models.

feature_1.title: Advanced Data Representation
feature_1.content: Supports a wide range of data objects such as charts, lists, tables, images, and more.

feature_2.title: Data Manipulation
feature_2.content: Apply formulas and sequential operations to format and display data effectively.

feature_3.title: Wide Range of Supported Formats
feature_3.content: Work seamlessly with all common document formats for templates or output files.

feature_4.title: Rich Template Markup
feature_4.content: Leverage ordinal, cardinal, and alphabetic numeric formatting in templates.

feature_5.title: Embed Barcodes
feature_5.content: Generate barcode images dynamically and insert them into your documents.

feature_6.title: Data Formatting
feature_6.content: Format strings in templates as uppercase, lowercase, capitalized, or first-letter capital styles.

feature_7.title: Document Content Manipulation
feature_7.content: Dynamically insert content from external documents into your reports.

feature_8.title: Save in Multiple Formats
feature_8.content: Specify the output file format using file extensions or detailed configurations.

feature_9.title: Flexible Data Processing
feature_9.content: Insert images and documents dynamically using Base64-encoded bytes.

index-content-net.code_samples_sample_2_content_2: Enhance your reports with visually appealing data representations.

index-content-java.head_title: Java Library for Document Creation, Automation & Reporting
index-content-java.head_description: Java library for automating document creation and generating reports. Create PDF, Word, Excel, PPTX, HTML, and email documents using custom templates.

index-content-java.description: Simplify report generation in Java by merging data with templates.
index-content-java.code_title: Generate a Chart in DOCX with Java
index-content-java.overview_description: A Java library designed for automated document creation and seamless data integration.

overview_feature_1.title: Merge Business Data into Templates with Java
overview_feature_1.description: Easily create professional reports by embedding data from JSON, XML, or other sources into pre-designed templates using {{ProdFullName}}.

overview_feature_2.title: Work with Embedded Objects
overview_feature_2.description: Automatically populate elements like tables, charts, and diagrams in documents using data from external sources.

overview_feature_3.title: Advanced Customization
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers flexible features like generating barcodes, pulling online data through URLs, and exporting output in different formats.

features.title: Key Capabilities of {{ProdShortName}}
features.description: Create professional documents and reports with advanced data handling.

feature_1.title: Visual Data Elements
feature_1.content: Add and format elements like charts, tables, images, and lists directly in your documents.

feature_2.title: Data Transformation
feature_2.content: Use formulas, sorting, and other tools to organize and present your data effectively.

feature_3.title: Support for Multiple Formats
feature_3.content: Easily work with common file types for both templates and output files.

feature_4.title: Enhanced Template Formatting
feature_4.content: Customize templates with numeric, alphabetic, and other advanced formatting options.

feature_5.title: Dynamic Barcode Generation
feature_5.content: Quickly create and insert barcode images into documents as needed.

feature_6.title: Flexible Text Styling
feature_6.content: Apply text transformations like uppercase, lowercase, title case, or other styles in templates.

feature_7.title: Import External Content
feature_7.content: Embed content from external files dynamically while generating documents.

feature_8.title: Export in Multiple Formats
feature_8.content: Save final documents in various file formats using specified extensions or configurations.

feature_9.title: Dynamic Media Embedding
feature_9.content: Insert images or other content using Base64-encoded data during document creation.

index-content-nodejs-java.head_title: {{EnvNameShort}} Text Search & Indexing Library for Documents, PDF, Office & Web
index-content-nodejs-java.head_description: Advanced text search solution for {{EnvNameShort}} applications to search, index & collect data from documents: PDF, Word, Excel, presentations, email & web file formats.
index-content-nodejs-java.title: Search & Index Documents using {{EnvNameShort}} API
index-content-nodejs-java.description: Enhance {{EnvNameShort}} Applications by implementing Text Search in All Popular Document Formats.

overview_feature_1.title: {{EnvNameShort}} Indexing and Search Operations
overview_feature_1.description: Indexing in {{ProdFullName}} collects, stores, and parses data for precise and efficient search operations. These indexes are frequently used to perform searches.

overview_feature_2.title: Merge Multiple Indexes to Enhance Search Efficiency
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdFullName}} API allows the merging of multiple indexes into one. Frequent modifications create several delta indexes, which can slow down search performance. Our solution merges these delta indexes into a common index, containing all the information from the merged delta indexes, significantly improving search efficiency while keeping the delta indexes unchanged. Various functionalities can be configured to fine-tune this process.

overview_feature_3.title: Recognize Search Queries from Different Keyboard Layouts
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} recognizes search queries that do not match the keyboard layout. Currently, 88 languages and 164 different keyboard layouts are supported.

overview_feature_4.title: Search Using Morphological Word Forms
overview_feature_4.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can search for various word forms, such as singular and plural nouns, or all forms of a verb. English and non-English languages can be customized for specific word forms.

features.title: {{ProdFullName}} Features
features.description: Control business document content using our advanced search engine, supporting popular file formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more.

feature_1.title: Flexible Parameters
feature_1.content: Use Date Range & Case Sensitivity as Search Parameters

feature_2.title: Spell Check Search
feature_2.content: Use Search Phrases with Spell Check and Wildcards & Skip Special Characters in Queries

feature_3.title: Results Filtering
feature_3.content: Set up Document Filtering in Search Results

feature_4.title: Import & Export
feature_4.content: Perform Import or Use List to Modify Characters during Indexing & Export to a File

feature_5.title: Skip Unnecessary Data
feature_5.content: Selectively Skip Indexing for Specific Files & Skip Specific Words to Index Faster

feature_6.title: URL Processing
feature_6.content: Extract HTML Formatted Text to a File & Generate URL to Navigate Search Results in HTML

feature_7.title: Rapid Search
feature_7.content: Divide Search into Smaller Chunks to Rapidly Search Large Indexes

feature_8.title: Stream Processing
feature_8.content: Index Documents from Streams and Data Structures

feature_9.title: Handle Misspelling
feature_9.content: Enable Exact Number of Occurrences for each Found Word to Offer Alternative Word Suggestions in case of Misspelling

feature_10.title: Archive Support
feature_10.content: Index Zipped Archives inside other ZIP Archives & Retrieve List of Indexed Files in an Archive

feature_11.title: Disk Space Saving
feature_11.content: Save Space with Compact Indexing & Index Password Secured Documents

feature_12.title: Custom Synonyms
feature_12.content: Add English Synonyms to Default Synonym Dictionary
